movie.title: Amazing Grace
movie.plot: The true story of William Wilberforce and his courageous quest to end the British slave trade. Along the way, Wilberforce meets intense opposition, but his minister urges him to see the cause through.

events.title: William Wilberforce is asked at dinner to lead a campaign against slavery
William Wilberforce first speaks about abolition in the House of Commons
William Wilberforce marries Barbara Ann Spooner at the Church of St Swithin
the Slave Trade Act is passed
the Slave Trade Act is passed, banning the slave trade within the British Empire
